faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some common questions about Soundy:

invite.question: 1. How do I invite Soundy to my server?
invite.answer: Use the `{{prefix}}invite` command or click [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1168385371294420992) to invite me.
invite.slashAnswer: Use the `/invite` command or click [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1168385371294420992) to invite me.

support.question: 2. How can I support the bot?
support.answer: You can vote for Soundy on Top.gg using the `{{prefix}}vote` command!
support.slashAnswer: You can vote for Soundy on Top.gg using the `/vote` command!

features.question: 3. What are Soundy's main features?
features.answer: Soundy is a powerful music bot with high-quality audio playback, filters, and an easy-to-use interface!

bugs.question: 4. How do I report a bug?
bugs.answer: Join our support server and report any issues in the appropriate channel.

suggestions.question: 5. How can I suggest new features?
suggestions.answer: Join our support server to suggest new features and improvements.

commands.question: 6. Where can I find the full list of commands?
commands.answer: Use the `{{prefix}}help` command to see all available commands and categories.
commands.slashAnswer: Use the `/help` command to see all available commands and categories.

troubleshooting.question: 7. How do I fix issues with playing music?
troubleshooting.answer:
If you're having trouble playing music with Soundy, try these steps:
1. Make sure you're in a voice channel
2. Check if Soundy has permissions to join and speak
3. Ensure the music URL or search query is valid
4. Try disconnecting and reconnecting Soundy
5. If issues continue, join our support server for help

filters.question: 8. How do I use filters?
filters.answer: Soundy offers various audio filters like nightcore, bassboost, 8D, etc. Use the corresponding commands (e.g., `{{prefix}}nightcore`, `{{prefix}}bassboost`) while music is playing.
filters.slashAnswer: Soundy offers various audio filters like nightcore, bassboost, 8D, etc. Use the corresponding commands (e.g., `/nightcore`, `/bassboost`) while music is playing.

help.title: Soundy Help Menu
help.description: Here are all available commands and categories:

mainMenu.title: Soundy Help Menu
mainMenu.description: **Soundy is a music bot designed to provide an amazing music listening experience on Discord. With its comprehensive and easy-to-use features, Soundy is the perfect choice for your Discord server.**
mainMenu.selectPrompt: **Select A Category From The Menu Below.**

categoryMenu.title: {{category}} Commands
categoryMenu.description: List of available commands in this category:
categoryMenu.notYourMenu: This menu is not for you!
categoryMenu.error:
Oops! It seems like I encountered an error while trying to help you. 
My circuits might be a bit overloaded right now. 
Could you please try again later? If the problem persists, 
please let my creators know. Gomen nasai!

description.3: **Here you can find detailed information about Soundy's various aspects:**
description.8: **Select A Category From The Menu Below.**

errors.notYourMenu: This menu is not for you!
errors.generic: An error occurred while fetching bot information.

node.title: Soundy Node Status
node.description: Select a node from the menu below to see detailed information

errors.notYourMenu: This menu is not for you!

description.header: Support the bot by voting for it on Top.gg!
description.note: Note: You can vote once every 12 hours!
description.message: You're awesome for choosing us! May your day be filled with fantastic tunes and good vibes. Let's keep the music playing!

translators.title: Bot Translators
translators.description: Here are all the amazing people who helped translate this bot:

noPlayer.title: No Active Player
noPlayer.description:
Oops! There's no music party happening here right now.
Try playing some tunes first!

notInVoice.title: Not in a Voice Channel
notInVoice.description:
Hey there, music explorer!
Looks like you're floating in digital space - join a voice channel first and let's discover some awesome tunes together!

notInSameVoice.title: Not in the Same Voice Channel
notInSameVoice.description: Oops! We need to be in the same voice channel to jam together! Come join me where I am!

noTracks.title: No Tracks in Queue
noTracks.description:
The stage is empty and waiting for your musical selections!
Add some tracks to create your perfect playlist.

music.notForYou: This menu is not for you!

autoplay.error: Oops! Something went wrong while toggling autoplay. Please try again!

clearqueue.title: Queue Cleared
clearqueue.description:
All tracks have been cleared from the queue!
Ready for some fresh tunes?

alreadyEmpty.title: Queue Already Empty
alreadyEmpty.description: The queue is already empty! Nothing to clear here.

error.title: Cannot Forward Beyond Track Duration
error.description: Oops! We can't forward beyond the track duration! Let's keep it in the groove!

grab.title: Track Saved
grab.description: A musical surprise awaits you in your DMs! Check it out!

error.title: Cannot Send DM
error.description: Oops! It seems your DM fortress is impenetrable. Adjust your privacy settings to receive the melodic message!

sentToDM.title: Track Saved!
sentToDM.description: I've sent the track details to your DMs!

success.title: Successfully Joined
success.description: Woohoo! I've crashed the party in {channel}! Time to turn up the volume and make some musical magic happen!

failed.title: Failed to Join
failed.description: Oops! Looks like I hit a sour note trying to join! Technical difficulties: {error}

leave.title: Left Voice Channel
leave.description:
The party's wrapped up! I've cleared the queue and left the channel.
Ready when you are for another musical adventure!

error.title: Error
error.description:
Whoopsie daisy! Looks like the music got a bit tangled up in its own rhythm.
Give it another shot in a moment, when the beat's back in sync!

loop.title: Loop Mode
loop.description: Select a loop mode from the menu below!

timeout.title: Loop Selection Timed Out
timeout.description: Oops! Looks like you didn't make a selection in time!

noQuery.description: Please provide a song name or play a song first!

invalidUrl.description: Could not resolve the music URL.

notFound.description: No lyrics found for this song.

error.description: Failed to fetch lyrics. Please try again later.

alreadyPaused.title: Already Paused
alreadyPaused.description:
The melody is already in a dreamy pause!
It's like the music is taking a peaceful nap.

paused.title: Paused
paused.description:
The rhythm has been gently suspended!
Your musical journey is on a magical intermission.

noQuery.title: Missing Query
noQuery.description: Hey there! Please provide a song name or URL for me to play.

missingPermissions.title: Missing Permissions
missingPermissions.description: I don't have permission to join and speak in your voice channel!

connectionError.title: Connection Error
connectionError.description: Failed to connect to voice channel. Please try again.

noResults.title: No Results Found
noResults.description: Oops! I couldn't find anything for: "{query}". Maybe try something else?

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.description: Oops! Something went wrong while trying to play your music. Please try again!

noPrevious.title: No Previous Track
noPrevious.description:
Oops! There's no previous track to play!
Let's keep the party going with the current one!

playing.title: Playing Previous Track
playing.description:
Rewinding the musical journey back to the beginning!
Time to groove to this awesome tune once more!

noTrack.title: No Track Playing
noTrack.description:
There's no track currently playing to replay!
Try playing something first!

success.title: Replaying Track
success.description:
Rewinding the musical journey back to the beginning!
Time to groove to this awesome tune once more!

alreadyPlaying.title: Already Playing
alreadyPlaying.description:
The music is already playing!
Let's keep the party going!

success.title: Resumed
success.description:
The music has been resumed!
Let's keep the party going!

invalidUrl.title: Invalid Search
invalidUrl.description: Please use {{prefix}}play command for direct links. This command is for searching songs by name.
invalidUrl.slashDescription: Please use /play command for direct links. This command is for searching songs by name.

missingPermissions.title: Missing Permissions
missingPermissions.description: I need permissions to join and speak in your voice channel!

Oops! Looks like we couldn't find any tunes for that search.

notInSameVoice.title: Not in the Same Voice Channel
notInSameVoice.description: Oops! We need to be in the same voice channel to jam together! Come join me where I am!

connectionError.title: Connection Error
connectionError.description: Failed to connect to voice channel. Please try again.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while searching for tracks.

missingPosition.title: Missing Position
missingPosition.description: Please specify a position to seek to (e.g. 1:30 or 90)

shuffle.description: The queue just got a fresh mix! Your songs are now dancing to a new rhythm!

notEnoughSongs.title: Not Enough Songs in the Queue
notEnoughSongs.description: Oops! We need at least two songs in the queue to shuffle them around! Let's add some more tunes to the mix!

The party's wrapped up! I've cleared the queue and packed up the speakers.

Whoopsie daisy! Looks like the music got a bit tangled up in its own rhythm.
